publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-207 Bashir Ahmad: Young Scottish Muslim Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the Youth Counselling Services Agency for hosting the first ever Young Scottish Muslim Conference; further congratulates it for hosting the first ever Young Scottish Muslim Awards Ceremony, and recognises the importance that such events and organisations play in integrating communities while allowing people to maintain a strong individual identity.

S3M-207 Young Scottish Muslim Awards (lodged on 19 June 2007) Alasdair Allan*, Ian McKee*, Liam McArthur*, Brian Adam*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Andrew Welsh*, Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Christina McKelvie*, Keith Brown*, Bob Doris*, Murdo Fraser*, Jackson Carlaw*, Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Robert Brown*, Elaine Smith*, Sandra White*, Nigel Don*, Margaret Smith*
S3M-207 Young Scottish Muslim Awards (lodged on 19 June 2007) Bill Wilson*

S3M-207 Bashir Ahmad: Young Scottish Muslim Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the Youth Counselling Services Agency for hosting the first ever Young Scottish Muslim Conference; further congratulates it for hosting the first ever Young Scottish Muslim Awards Ceremony, and recognises the importance that such events and organisations play in integrating communities while allowing people to maintain a strong individual identity. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Ian McKee, Liam McArthur, Brian Adam, Roseanna Cunningham, Andrew Welsh, Alex Neil, Rob Gibson, Joe FitzPatrick, Christina McKelvie, Keith Brown, Bob Doris, Murdo Fraser, Jackson Carlaw, Robin Harper, Hugh O’Donnell, Malcolm Chisholm, Robert Brown, Elaine Smith, Sandra White, Nigel Don, Margaret Smith, Bill Wilson
S3M-207 Young Scottish Muslim Awards (lodged on 19 June 2007) Christine Grahame*
S3M-207 Young Scottish Muslim Awards (lodged on 19 June 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
